pages.page: Garmin Index Garmin Index smart scale provides the metrics you need to track progress and see results. Measures: • Weight • BMI • Fat% • Water % • Muscle Mass • Bone Mass Wireless Sync • Automatically syncs up to 16 Garmin Connect accounts • Supports syncing via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, and ANT+ Night-readable Display 400lb Weight Capacity Battery Life: Four AA batteries – up to 9 months
